  ggplot(data_morphs)+
  geom_area(
    aes(gen, N, fill = move_strat)
  )+
  scale_fill_manual(
    values = c(
      "prey tracking" = "seagreen",
      "prey and handler tracking" = "royalblue",
      "non-handler avoiding" = "red",
      "handler avoiding" = "orange",
      "handler tracking" = "lightblue",
      "other" = "black",
      "NA" = "black"
    ),
    breaks = c(
      "prey tracking",
      "handler tracking",
      "prey and handler tracking",
      "non-handler avoiding",
      "handler avoiding",
      "other"
    ),
    na.value = "black"
  )+
  theme_test()+
  theme(
    strip.background = element_blank(),
    strip.text = element_text(
      face = "italic"
    ),
    legend.position = "top",
    legend.key.width = unit(5, units = "mm"),
    legend.key.height = unit(1, "mm")
  )+
  facet_grid(
    repl ~ spread,
    labeller = label_both
  )+
  coord_cartesian(
    expand = F
  )+
  labs(
    x = "Generation",
    y = "# Agents",
    fill = NULL
  )
